alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:00PM EDT until July 01 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LACKAWANNA AND WEST CENTRAL WAYNE COUNTIES... At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Cobb, or 8 miles south of Carbondale, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dunmore, Archbald, Olyphant, Jessup, Throop, South Canaan, Waymart, Elmhurst, Prompton and Tresslarville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
